text: Alfredo Ernesto Poveda Burbano (January 24, 1926 â€“ June 7, 1990) was an Ecuadorian politician. He was the Interim President of Ecuador January 11, 1976, to August 10, 1979. ==References== ==Other websites== * Unofficial short Biography (broken) Category:1926 births Category:1990 deaths Category:Presidents of Ecuador
